content.description: Sir start low on flat jugs as pictured. Work up to exit on the sloper with the white patch and mantle out.
content.protection: 1 pad. Wear shoes while hanging out due to bottles being tossed from roadway for years.
content.location: Park at Juji Fruit pullout. Head downhill and pass Pullout Game. Head north 35 yds and you cannot miss the beautiful roof boulder.

content.description: Examine the right side of the top ledge. There are a set of tatas. This will be the exit.Sit start low on flat jugs and work out to the right on cruiser moves. Figure out a way to exit between the knobs and mantle out!
content.protection: 2 pads recommended. Wear shoes while hanging out. Glass bottles have been tossed down here for years.
content.location: See area description. Park at Juji. Head downhill and go north 35 yds looking right.

content.description: Sit start low in flat jugs as shown in picture. Exit straight up on a serious 1-2 finger hold and mantle. This problem is left of the two Knobs to the right (Next Rock exit).This is the most committing of the 3 problems.
content.protection: 1-2 pads. Spotter for most folks. Wear shoes while hanging out. People have been tossing bottles down here for ages.
content.location: Park at Juji Fruit pullout. Head downhill and pass Pullout Game. Head north 35 yds and you cannot miss this beautiful roof boulder.

content.description:
West facing roof boulder and would a perfect grassy flat landing if tourists wouldn’t chunk beer bottles off the pullout.  

  We are cleaning up the area of trash and any help would be greatly appreciated. 

  Under the roof there are 3 obvious lines of varying difficulty and a couple trick moves. 

  Great problems about 20’ beneath mount scott road and 1 minute approach. You can even toss your pads down to the boulder.
